alluxio.client.file

Class UnknownLengthFileInStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • alluxio.client.file.FileInStream
        • alluxio.client.file.UnknownLengthFileInStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundedStream, Seekable, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @PublicApi
 @NotThreadSafe
public final class UnknownLengthFileInStream
extends FileInStream
    A streaming API to read a file of unknown length. A file of unknown length cannot be more than one block. TODO(gpang): This class should probably not implement BoundedStream, since remaining() does not make sense for a file of unknown length. Investigate an alternative class hierarchy.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class alluxio.client.file.FileInStream

      • getBlockSize

        protected long getBlockSize(long pos)
        Description copied from class: FileInStream
        If we are not in the last block or if the last block is equal to the normal block size, return the normal block size. Otherwise return the block size of the last block.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
